item.description:
It's that time of year again!!  Time to see all those cute puggies in all those silly costumes!!

We'll hold our October/Halloween Meet Up on Sunday, October 28th from 11am to 1pm.  Costumes for both pugs and people are optional. 

If you have friends w/ dogs who would like to attend, bring them along!!  The more the merrier.

First time attendees should bring proof of vaccinations for rabies, distemper and canine cough.  If anyone would like to schedule a grooming for after the meeting, please let me know ahead of time so I can make sure I have a groomer available.

Velvet and I are looking forward to seeing you!!

Agni
item.name: OCTOBER MEET UP - COSTUMES!!!
